game.name: TonoTone
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, VR 전용, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: TonoTone is a built-for-VR cockpit style modular synthesizer. Using in-game waveform generation, learn to create dynamic melodies, polyrhythms, and complex compositions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: TonoTone is a built-for-VR cockpit style modular synthesizer. Using in-game waveform generation, learn to create dynamic melodies, polyrhythms, and complex compositions.
